title: "Speed and efficiency boosted by manufacturing machine learning system"
excerpt: "A new machine learning (ML) system that analyses production data and learns from experience could boost speed and efficiency at manufacturers of all sizes, according to its developers. The modular and transparent approach used in the software suite developed for the ML4P (Machine Learning for Production) project could reduce the barrier to entry for small companies,"
